caption.center: JEROME TATUM, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal pursuant to Fla.R.App.P. 9.141(b)(2) from the Circuit Court for Sarasota County; Andrew D. Owens, Jr., Judge.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed. See Moore v. State, 882 So. 2d 977 (Fla. 2004); Carpenter v. State, 884 So. 2d 385 (Fla. 2d DCA 2004); Daly v. State, 850 So. 2d 617 (Fla. 2d DCA 2003); Brown v. State, 827 So. 2d 1054 (Fla. 2d DCA 2002); Allen v. State, 740 So. 2d 1180 (Fla. 2d DCA 1999); State v. Laperreri, 710 So. 2d 119 (Fla. 2d DCA 1998).
ALTENBERND, NORTHCUTT, and SALCINES, JJ., Concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DETERMINED.
